thread.title: Mourinho drops Man Utd team selection hint: This star could replace Mkhitaryan
thread.title_full: Mourinho drops Man Utd team selection hint: This star could replace Mkhitaryan

title: Mourinho drops Man Utd team selection hint: This star could replace Mkhitaryan
text:
Paul Scholes and Michael Owen have predicted Man Utd's EFL Cup final team Without Mkhitaryan, if we want to play with a No.10, obviously Wayne is this position. Jose Mourinho 
"I have to make a decision," Mourinho said. "You know that we normally play two different systems, if you want. 
“Sometimes, we play with two midfield players and a No.10, if you want to call it. Sometimes, we play with a No.6 and two midfield players in front. 
"Without Mkhitaryan, if we want to play with a No.10, obviously Wayne is this position. 
“It's where he was playing with us in many matches, so he is an option for me. A final is a special match and he's an option for me." GETTY Henrikh Mkhitaryan will miss thr game through injury GETTY Jose Mourinho insists he will not pick a team based on sentiment 
And when asked whether sentiment would play any part in his team selection, Mourinho was quick to suggest he will only be basing his decision on his strongest starting XI. 
"The best 11 players," he stated. "We win all together. 
“It doesn't matter if you play, didn't play, if you play much or don't play much. I go for the best possible team." Related articles
